titleStmt.title: The principles of Christian practice Containing the institution of a Christian man, in twelve heads of doctrine: which are set downe in the next side. By Thomas Taylor D.D. and late pastor of Aldermanbury London. Perfected by himselfe before his decease.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung and John Beale] for I. Bartlet, in Cheap-side at the Golden-cup in Gold-smiths Row,

notesStmt.note: Beale printed quires ² R-2D; Young printed the rest (STC).
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Cheap-side at the Golden-cup in Gold-smiths Row
